parameter.name: modelName
parameter.label: Model Name
parameter.description: Model name without extension.

parameter.name: preloadModel
parameter.label: Preload Model
parameter.description: Keep the model loaded. If the parameter is set to true, the model will be reloaded only on configuration updates. If the model is not loaded when needed, the service will try to load it. If the parameter is set to false, the model will be loaded and unloaded on each run.

parameter.name: singleUtteranceMode
parameter.label: Single Utterance Mode
parameter.description: When enabled recognition stops listening after a single utterance.

parameter.name: maxSeconds
parameter.label: Max Transcription Seconds
parameter.description: Max seconds to wait to force stop the transcription.

parameter.name: vadMode
parameter.label: Voice Activity Detection Mode
parameter.description: Available VAD modes. Quality is the most likely to detect voice.

parameter.name: vadStep
parameter.label: Voice Activity Detection Step
parameter.description: VAD step in milliseconds.

parameter.name: vadSensitivity
parameter.label: Voice Activity Detection Sensitivity
parameter.description: Percentage in range 0-1 of voice activity in one second to consider it as voice.

parameter.name: initSilenceSeconds
parameter.label: Initial Silence Seconds
parameter.description: Initial seconds of silence to discard transcription.

parameter.name: maxSilenceSeconds
parameter.label: Max Silence Seconds
parameter.description: Seconds of silence to trigger transcription.

parameter.name: removeSilence
parameter.label: Remove Silence
parameter.description: Remove silence frames.

parameter.name: removeSpecials
parameter.label: Remove Specials
parameter.description: Remove some characters from the transcription: ",", ".", "¿", "?", "¡", "!".

parameter.name: createWAVFile
parameter.label: Create WAV File
parameter.description: Create wav audio file on each transcription call, useful for debugging purposes, or to collect recordings.

parameter.name: threads
parameter.label: Threads
parameter.description: Number of threads used by whisper. (0 for default)

parameter.name: audioContext
parameter.label: Audio Context
parameter.description: Overwrite the audio context size. (0 for default)

parameter.name: samplingStrategy
parameter.label: Sampling strategy
parameter.description: Sampling strategy used.

parameter.name: beamSize
parameter.label: Beam Size
parameter.description: Beam Size configuration for sampling strategy Bean Search.

parameter.name: greedyBestOf
parameter.label: Greedy Best Of
parameter.description: Best Of configuration for sampling strategy Greedy.

parameter.name: temperature
parameter.label: Temperature
parameter.description: Temperature threshold.

parameter.name: speedUp
parameter.label: Speed Up
parameter.description: Speed up audio by x2. (reduced accuracy)

parameter.name: noResultsMessage
parameter.label: No Results Message
parameter.description: Message to be told when no results.

parameter.name: errorMessage
parameter.label: Error Message
parameter.description: Message to be told when an error has happened. (Empty for disabled)
